entry.title: SharpKit extension/plugin called UnobtrusiveFeatures
entry.content: SharpKit, the C# to javascript compiler, is super, but there are some things that irritate me and one them is the export definition.

entry.title: Technology behind this site
entry.content: Here is a technology overrview and workflow behind this website. This site is hosted at GitHub and pregenerated from ASP.NET MVC web application.

entry.title: JavascriptSerializer in the RegisterStartupScript
entry.content: Startup script behavior in the ASP.NET WebForms inside UpdatePanel containing script tags.

entry.title: Creating route links and passing-in values
entry.content: How hard creating links to blog posts can be and how we make it (from our point of view) easier.

entry.content: About interception for uniform interfaces like those used in the MediatR.

entry.content: A bit of thoughts about omnipresent hamburger menus.

entry.title: Productivity - Solution Runner
entry.content: A brief introduction of a first product of the Productivity pack. Easy-to-use and super-fast tool for starting Visual Studio solutions.

entry.title: Naming stuff, mostly in C#/.NET
entry.content: A list of code rules we have built in time to save time and headaches.

entry.title: Blazor and the booting screen
entry.content: A first tip in a possible Blazor serie is about configuring loading screen. A replacement of the default "Loading..." with something more eye catching.

entry.title: Blazor and complex component parameters
entry.content: A second tip. So clear and obvious, but it took some time to me to realize.

entry.title: Blazor and page parameters
entry.content: A third tip. About reusing current page instance when links targets to it (possibly with different parameters).
